summary: Deploy a website to Internet Computer (icp0.io), moving from expiring draft deployments to a permanent published deployment with a shareable stable link.
architectural_notes: Current hosting target is Internet Computer (icp0.io); draft canisters expire, so permanent deployment is required for a stable shareable link.
known_issues: Draft deployment links can become invalid due to canister expiration ("invalid canister" error) until redeployed or published permanently.

existing_features.title: Deploy the existing Beniwal Music Center app as a permanent (non-draft, non-expiring) Internet Computer canister so the public icp0.io URL remains stable and does not later show “invalid canister” / “Canister ID Not Resolved”.
Provide the final permanent, shareable website link (icp0.io URL) that the user can send to others.

new_feature_requests.summary: Publish/deploy the website permanently so the icp0.io link is stable and does not expire (not a draft canister).

projectName: Publish Beniwal Music Center website permanently with a stable shareable icp0.io link
